Name: KYC Approved
Subject: You’re verified and ready to go 🎉
HtmlBody:
Hi {{first_name}},

Great news — your identity check is complete and your account is fully verified.

You can now start receiving mail at your VirtualAddressHub address:

Your Business Address

🔐 Manage your mail any time:
Access my dashboard

Welcome aboard!

If you have any questions, feel free to reply to this email.

— The VirtualAddressHub Team
